TheKombatant:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

TheKombatant:JinseiRelic.NAME: Jinsei Basin
TheKombatant:JinseiRelic.FLAVOR: You feel the Lifeforce of Earthrealm.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 Bar (33%) of #yMeter.

TheKombatant:TasteofSaltRelic.NAME: Taste of Salt
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #ySpecial, gain #b2 Block.

TheKombatant:CoreCyraxRelic.NAME: Core: Cyrax
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play #y5 Attacks in a turn, apply #b2 #yWeak to ALL enemies.

TheKombatant:CoreSektorRelic.NAME: Core: Sektor
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play #y5 Attacks in a turn, Deal #b5 damage to ALL enemies.

TheKombatant:CoreSmokeRelic.NAME: Core: Smoke
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play #y5 Attacks in a turn, gain #b6 Block.

TheKombatant:ShinnoksAmuletRelic.NAME: Shinnok's Amulet
TheKombatant:ShinnoksAmuletRelic.FLAVOR: Dark Tidings from the Past and Future.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, Retain #b1 card. Retain a #b2nd Card if you have at least #b2 #yBars (66%) of #yMeter.

TheKombatant:Shinnoks2ndAmuletRelic.NAME: Shinnok's Amulet
TheKombatant:Shinnoks2ndAmuletRelic.FLAVOR: Dark Tidings from the Past and Future.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, Retain #b1 Kard for each unspent #yBar (33%) of #yMeter.

TheKombatant:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
TheKombatant:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
